hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Quick answers about bookings, gift cards, and your visit.

questions.question: How do I book an appointment?
questions.answer: You can book online, or contact us directly by phone or WhatsApp to find the best time for you.

questions.question: How far in advance should I book?
questions.answer: We recommend booking at least 48 hours in advance. For weekends and peak hours, booking earlier helps ensure availability.

questions.question: Can I reschedule or cancel?
questions.answer: Yes. Please let us know as soon as possible if you need to change your appointment. Late cancellations may be subject to a fee depending on the notice given.

questions.question: When should I arrive?
questions.answer: Arriving 10 minutes early gives you time to settle in and start the experience calmly.

questions.question: What should I bring?
questions.answer: Nothing special. We provide what you need for the session. If you have any preferences or sensitivities (pressure, oils, aromas), just tell us.

questions.question: Do you have changing rooms or showers?
questions.answer: We have a comfortable space to get ready before and after your treatment. If you need something specific, contact us and we’ll advise you.

questions.question: Can I choose the oil or aroma?
questions.answer: Yes. Whenever the treatment uses oil, we can adapt to your preferences and sensitivities. If you have allergies, please tell us before starting.

questions.question: Are you responsible for personal belongings?
questions.answer: Please keep an eye on your personal items. We recommend avoiding valuables, as we can’t take responsibility for lost or forgotten belongings.

questions.question: How do I buy a gift card?
questions.answer: Choose a treatment on our website, select the gift option, and complete the purchase. You’ll receive the gift card by email.

questions.question: How do I redeem a gift card?
questions.answer: Contact us to book and share the gift card code/locator. We’ll help you find the best slot.

questions.question: How long is a gift card valid for?
questions.answer: Gift cards are valid for 1 year from the purchase date.

questions.question: Can I switch the treatment on my gift card?
questions.answer: You can switch to another treatment of equal or higher value. If the new option costs more, you can pay the difference.

questions.question: Are gift cards refundable or transferable?
questions.answer: Gift cards are not refundable once purchased, but they can be transferred to another person as long as the code/locator is provided.

questions.question: What if I lose the gift card email/PDF?
questions.answer: If you still have the purchase confirmation, contact us and we’ll do our best to help you recover the details.

questions.question: Who is responsible for this website?
questions.answer: This website is operated by Terraterapies Thai & Bali.

questions.question: Is it safe to purchase online?
questions.answer: Yes. Online payments are processed through secure payment providers. We do not store your card details.

questions.question: What personal data do you collect?
questions.answer: Only what is needed to manage bookings and purchases (for example, name and contact details). We use it exclusively for service management and related communications.

questions.question: Do you share my data with third parties?
questions.answer: We do not sell your data. We only share information when it’s required to provide the service (for example, payment processing), and always under appropriate safeguards.
